mapper.select: SELECT category_id, parent_id, name, depth, sort_order, is_active FROM et_category WHERE deleted_at IS NULL AND is_active = 'Y' ORDER BY depth ASC, sort_order ASC
SELECT category_id, parent_id, name, depth, sort_order, is_active FROM et_category WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} AND deleted_at IS NULL AND is_active = 'Y' ORDER BY sort_order ASC

WITH RECURSIVE cte AS ( SELECT category_id, parent_id, name, depth, sort_order, is_active, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at FROM et_category WHERE category_id = #{rootId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT c.category_id, c.parent_id, c.name, c.depth, c.sort_order, c.is_active, c.created_at, c.updated_at, c.deleted_at FROM et_category c INNER JOIN cte p ON c.parent_id = p.category_id WHERE c.deleted_at IS NULL ) SELECT * FROM cte
